name: elemental-alchemy-client
description: Client-side build for elemental alchemy game

scripts.build: bun run clean && bun run build:css && bun run build:js
scripts.dev: bun run build:css && bun build src/index.tsx --outfile=../dist/bundle.js --watch --external=./index.css
scripts.clean: powershell -Command "New-Item -ItemType Directory -Force -Path '../dist' | Out-Null; if (Test-Path '../dist/bundle.js') { Remove-Item '../dist/bundle.js' }; if (Test-Path '../dist/bundle.css') { Remove-Item '../dist/bundle.css' }"
